message: Starting integration testing. Waiting 120 seconds for other agents to complete their implementations before reading documentation and creating test suite.
Wait complete. Now reading implementation documentation from output/ directory to understand what was built.

Documentation read. Understanding: (1) No file locking causes race conditions, (2) Triple registry loads waste I/O, (3) No deduplication checks, (4) Resource leaks on failures, (5) 87 ghost entries exist. Now checking if other agents have completed their implementations.
Confirmed implementations exist: fcntl locking, atomic utilities, deduplication helper. Now creating comprehensive test suite to verify all fixes work correctly.
Test suite created (10 comprehensive tests). Now executing test suite to verify all fixes.

Test suite executed: 7/10 PASS (70%). CRITICAL: Triple load bug still exists at lines 2882/2913/2932/2940. 18 ghost entries detected. Atomic utilities and deduplication work. Now analyzing detailed results and creating comprehensive report.

Final report created. Testing summary: Infrastructure implemented (locking, atomic ops, deduplication, validation) BUT triple load bug remains unfixed in deploy_headless_agent. 18 ghost entries persist. System is 70% complete but NOT production-ready. Now creating actionable summary.

INTEGRATION TESTING COMPLETED. Executed 10 comprehensive tests (70% pass rate). Created 4 deliverables: test suite, detailed results, 350-line analysis report, actionable fix guide. FINDINGS: Infrastructure implemented correctly (locking, atomic ops, deduplication, validation) but NOT INTEGRATED into deploy_headless_agent. Critical gap: 4 unlocked registry loads at lines 2882/2913/2932/2940. 18 ghost entries persist. System NOT production-ready. Next: Deploy deployment_refactorer to fix triple load bug.
